import React, {Component} from 'react' import './report.css' import { ColorRing } from 'react-loader-spinner' import Cookies from 'js-cookie'; import DataTable from 'react-data-table-component'; import * as Bootstrap from 'react-bootstrap'; const availableSizes = [50, 100, 250] const CENTS_TO_DOLLAR_CONVERSION_FACTOR = 100.00 const REPORT_VALUE_MAPPING = {'STK':'attr_types.diamond#stock_number','CERT':'attr_types.diamond#cert_number','SHP':'attr_types.diamond#shape','COL':'attr_types.diamond#color','CLAR':'attr_types.diamond#clarity','CTS':'attr_types.gem#carats','MILKY':'attr_types.diamond#milky','SHADE':'attr_types.diamond#shade','MAKE':'attr_types.diamond#make','FLOUR':'attr_types.diamond#fluor','BIC':'attr_types.diamond#black_in_center','BIS':'attr_types.diamond#black_in_side','WIC':'attr_types.diamond#white_in_center','WIS':'attr_types.diamond#white_in_side','LAB':'attr_types.diamond#cert','RAP %':'attr_types.diamond#rap_percent', '$/CT':'attr_types.gem#price_per_carat', 'Total': 'sell_offer_cents'} const ExpanableComponent = ({ data }) =>
{/*Data Column*/}
{/*ID*/}
ID
: {data.id}
{/*First Row*/}
Stock Number
: {data.item_attributes['diamond#stock_number'].trans}
Shape
: {data.item_attributes['diamond#shape'].trans}
Carats
: {data.item_attributes['gem#carats'].trans}
Color
: {data.item_attributes['diamond#color'].trans}
Clarity
: {data.item_attributes['diamond#clarity'].trans}
Cut
: {data.item_attributes['diamond#cut'].trans}
Certificate #
: {data.item_attributes['diamond#cert_number'].trans}
Lab
: {data.item_attributes['diamond#cert'].trans}
Polish
: {data.item_attributes['diamond#polish'].trans}
Symmetry
: {data.item_attributes['diamond#symmetry'].trans}
Fluorescence
: {data.item_attributes['diamond#fluor'].trans}
Fluor Color
: {data.item_attributes['diamond#fluor_color'].trans}
{/*Second Row*/}
Shade
: {data.item_attributes['diamond#shade'].trans}
Milky
: {data.item_attributes['diamond#milky'].trans}
CertificateComment
: {data.item_attributes['diamond#cert_comment'].trans}
Eye Clean #
: {data.item_attributes['diamond#eye_clean'].trans}
Black In Center
: {data.item_attributes['diamond#black_in_center'].trans}
Key to Symbol
: {data.item_attributes['diamond#key_to_symbol'].trans}
{/*Third Row*/}
Price Per Carat
: {data.item_attributes['gem#price_per_carat'].trans}
Rap Price/Carat
: {data.item_attributes['diamond#rap_price'].trans}
Top Bid
: {data.item_attributes['gem#carats'].trans}
Total Price
: ${data.sell_offer_cents/CENTS_TO_DOLLAR_CONVERSION_FACTOR}
Rap %
: {data.item_attributes['diamond#rap_percent'].trans}
Top Bid Gap
: {data.item_attributes['diamond#polish'].trans}
{/*Image Data Column*/}

This will have image preview

const DEFAULT_COLUMNS = { 'LD ID' : row => row.id, 'STK' : row => row.item_attributes['diamond#stock_number'].trans, 'CERT' : row => row.item_attributes['diamond#cert_number'].trans, 'AGING' : row => row.aging_group, 'SHP' : row => row.item_attributes['diamond#shape'].trans, 'COL' : row => row.item_attributes['diamond#color'].trans, 'CLAR' : row => row.item_attributes['diamond#clarity'].trans, 'CTS' : row => row.item_attributes['gem#carats'].trans, 'MILKY' : row => row.item_attributes['diamond#milky'].trans, 'SHADE' : row => row.item_attributes['diamond#shade'].trans, 'MAKE' : row => row.item_attributes['diamond#make'].trans, 'FLOUR' : row => row.item_attributes['diamond#fluor'].trans, 'BIC' : row => row.item_attributes['diamond#black_in_center'].trans, 'BIS' : row => row.item_attributes['diamond#black_in_side'].trans, 'WIC' : row => row.item_attributes['diamond#white_in_center'].trans, 'WIS' : row => row.item_attributes['diamond#white_in_side'].trans, 'LAB' : row => row.item_attributes['diamond#cert'].trans, 'RAP %' : row => row.item_attributes['diamond#rap_percent'].trans, '$/CT' : row => row.item_attributes['gem#price_per_carat'].trans, 'Total' : row => "$" + Math.round(row.sell_offer_cents/100), } const columns = []; Object.entries(DEFAULT_COLUMNS).map(([key, selector_attr]) => { columns.push({ name: key, selector: selector_attr, sortable: (REPORT_VALUE_MAPPING[key] ? true : false), }) }) class AgingReport extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { expandedComponent: '

', itemsData: {}, columns: columns, totalRows: 0, DataisLoaded: false, apiDataisLoaded: false, showAlert: false, filterHash: { 'pageNumber' : 0, 'from' : 0, 'size' : availableSizes[0], 'show_mine' : true, 'show_others' : true, 'seller_account_id' : '', 'get_filtered_data' : true, 'item_filter' : {'discrete': {'state':['for_sale']}}, 'get_only_matching_count' : false, 'change_breakdown' : false, 'get_turn' : false, 'sort_by' : 'sell_offer_cents', 'asc_desc' : 'asc' } }; this.multi_sort = "&multi_sort%5B0%5D%5Battr_types.diamond%23shape%5D=asc&multi_sort%5B1%5D%5Bcarat_ranges%5D=asc&multi_sort%5B2%5D%5Battr_types.diamond%23color%5D=asc&multi_sort%5B3%5D%5Battr_types.diamond%23clarity%5D=asc" this.captureUrls = this.captureUrls.bind(this) this.collectAgingData = this.collectAgingData.bind(this) this.handlePerRowsChange = this.handlePerRowsChange.bind(this) this.handlePageChange = this.handlePageChange.bind(this) this.doSort = this.doSort.bind(this) } doSort(column, sortDirection){ var filterHash = this.state.filterHash filterHash['sort_by'] = REPORT_VALUE_MAPPING[column.name] filterHash['asc_desc'] = sortDirection this.multi_sort = '' this.setState({filterHash: filterHash, apiDataisLoaded: false}) this.collectAgingData() } componentDidMount() { this.collectAgingData() } handlePerRowsChange(sizePerPage){ let filterHash = this.state.filterHash filterHash.size = sizePerPage filterHash.from = 0 this.setState({filterHash: filterHash, apiDataisLoaded: false}) this.collectAgingData() } handlePageChange(pageNumber){ let filterHash = this.state.filterHash filterHash.from = filterHash.size * (pageNumber-1) this.setState({filterHash: filterHash, apiDataisLoaded: false}) this.collectAgingData() } collectAgingData(){ this.captureUrls() let accessToken = Cookies.get('access_token') let queryParams = this.serialize(this.state.filterHash) + this.multi_sort fetch(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL + "/items.json?"+ queryParams, {method: 'GET', headers: {'Authorization': 'Bearer '+ accessToken}}) .then(response => response.json()) .then((response) => { if(response.meta.total < 1) this.setState({showAlert: true}) if (response.errors) alert(response.errors.error) else this.setState({itemsData: response.items,expandedComponent:JSON.stringify(response.item, null, 2),totalRows:response.meta.total,DataisLoaded: true, apiDataisLoaded: true}) }) } serialize(obj, prefix) { var str = [], p,m; for (p in obj) { if (obj.hasOwnProperty(p)) { if (!isNaN(p)){ m='' }else{ m=p } var k = prefix ? prefix + "["+m+"]" : p, v = obj[p]; str.push((v !== null && typeof v === "object") ? this.serialize(v, k) : encodeURIComponent(k) + "=" + encodeURIComponent(v)); } } return str.join("&"); } captureUrls(){ const queryParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); let sellerIds let filterHash = this.state.filterHash var sellerIdString = queryParams.get('sellerIds') if (sellerIdString){ sellerIds = sellerIdString.split(','); filterHash['seller_account_id'] = sellerIds } this.setState({ filterHash: filterHash }) } render(){ const { DataisLoaded, apiDataisLoaded, itemsData, columns, totalRows, expandedComponent } = this.state; const tableOpacity = apiDataisLoaded ? 1 : 0.5 const displayLoader = apiDataisLoaded ? 'none' : 'block' let showAlert = (totalRows < 1 && this.state.showAlert) if (!DataisLoaded) return(

Fetching reports for you....

) return (

Aging Report

{showAlert ? this.setState({showAlert: false})} dismissible style={{width: "80%", marginLeft: '10%'}}> Oops, we couldn’t find any data. :

Please wait....

}
) } } export default AgingReport
